= Technical problems =

 * *I get the following message when I try to compile !OpenDial with `ant`: `javac: invalid target release: 1.8`.

All version of !OpenDial > 0.95 require Java 8 in order to compile.  Simply download and install the Java 8 JDK in order to solve the issue.
